answers.answer: Not moving at all? How long has it been

Just since 4 this morning. I'm not extremely worried, because she is out of room. And I have gestional diabetes, so those babies don't move as much. Just wondering if anyone else has experienced this. To be honest I think she is preparing for birth.
Mine was like that diabetes and all. Towards the end he did stop moving as much which I was told was normal after panicking several times lol.
Same boat just no diabetes. Babies run outta room plus now they sleep 90% of the time
I am going to see if they will take her tomorrow, because she is measuring at a 43 week baby anyways.

question: Anyone experienced a baby not moving at 38 weeks? They say she is almost 8 pounds and I could go anytime. My c-section is 8 days.
title: Baby not moving.
